function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Leadership-dependent effectiveness in dedicated management governance","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inter-agency governance compensating for lack of training and network-related capital, leading to improved coordination and response to crisis situations.","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impromptu protocols and loose guidelines from national governments may lead to enforcement leading to varying levels of actual mobility","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent communication and countries","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between different municipal entities leading to ineffective management of urban green decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate governance leading to crowded urban green spaces","category":"Weak local decision-making
